useCase.name: Get Average Lending Duration Per Book

mainSequence.step: Librarian sends a request to get the average lending duration per book
LendingController calls LendingService to get the average lending duration per book
LendingService retrieves the average lending duration per book from LendingRepository
LendingService maps the results to LendingAvgPerBookViewList using LendingAvgPerBookViewMapper
LendingController sends back the results to the Librarian
